TITLE: Non-Degree Program
DEF: Post secondary education without a recognized certificate of achievement.
TASK: The Non-Degree Program pattern provides specialized knowledge and skills for personal enrichment or career advancement without awarding a formal degree. NDPRO stresses program relevance, incorporation of industry trends, and credentialing opportunities to address challenges like lack of recognition and outdated content. AI can help by providing real-time labor market information and personalized learning experiences.
